title: Early closure of five NEL stations due to maintenance

updates.text: Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE17 Punggol & NE13 Kovan will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri & Sat – 26 & 27 July. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.
